name: Add More Sounds

banner.text: Complete the Lightsaber by adding sounds when it moves.

steps.openFlyoutCopy: All of the blocks you need are now sorted into trays depending on what those blocks do. Open the ${toolbox#events} tray.
steps.grabBlockCopy: Drag this block into the code space.
steps.dropCopy: Drop the block anywhere in your code space.

steps.bannerCopy: This block will run the code inside of it when you swipe in different directions over The Force Coding Kit. Change the Forward swipe to a Left swipe.

steps.grabBlockCopy: Drag the Speaker: play block into the code space.

steps.openFlyoutCopy: Make a random Lightsaber sound play when you swipe by using a random sound block. Open the ${part#speaker>toolbox} tray.
steps.grabBlockCopy: Drag this block into the code space.

steps.bannerCopy: Change <kc-string-preview>Lightsaber</kc-string-preview> to <kc-string-preview>Lightsaber Swings</kc-string-preview> from the dropdown list. Every time you swipe left, the block will pick a random sound from the <kc-string-preview>Lightsaber Swings</kc-string-preview> category and play it.

steps.text: Swipe your hand left ← to hear a random Lightsaber sound.

steps.openFlyoutCopy: Make a random Lightsaber sound play when you swipe your hand right, too. Open the ${toolbox#events} tray.
steps.grabBlockCopy: Drag this block into the code space.
steps.dropCopy: Drop the block anywhere in your code space.

steps.bannerCopy: Change Forward to Right from the dropdown list.

steps.grabBlockCopy: Drag <kc-string-preview>Speaker: play</kc-string-preview> into the code space.
Drag this block into the code space.

steps.bannerCopy: Change <kc-string-preview>Lightsaber</kc-string-preview> to <kc-string-preview>Lightsaber Swings</kc-string-preview> from the dropdown list.

steps.text: Now swipe your hand right → to wield the Lightsaber.

banner.text: Impressive, you continue to surprise me. But which path will you choose: dark or light?

tooltips.text: Try changing <kc-string-preview>Lightsaber Swings</kc-string-preview> to a different category.
